DOC.brief_summary: This study test modification Cognitive Processing Therapy ( CPT ) Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder , ( PTSD ) CPT augment compensatory cognitive rehabilitation principle Cognitive Symptom Management Rehabilitation Therapy ( CogSMART ) intervention create hybrid treatment , SMART-CPT . This study investigate efficacy SMART-CPT improve PTSD post-concussive symptom , cognition , quality life , treatment compliance history mild moderate TBI persistent cognitive complaint .
DOC.brief_title: Enhanced Cognitive Rehabilitation Treat Comorbid TBI PTSD
DOC.criteria: 1 ) OEF/OIF veteran ; 2 ) Current diagnosis PTSD ; 3 ) History mildtomoderate TBI ; 4 ) Subjective cognitive complaint ; 5 ) No anticipated/pending medication change ; 6 ) Written inform consent participate study . 1 ) Active substance dependence , 2 ) Suicidal intent attempt within previous month ; 3 ) Current psychotic disorder ; 4 ) Dementia ; 5 ) NonEnglish speaking ; 6 ) Participation intervention study .
